page.title: 04FARMING in Thanet
page.content: {THORNE FARM Cliffsend Mr. Montgomery's father came to the farm in 1936 and passed the farm on to him when he died. This is a typical small farm of Thanet and its main market is Covent Garden,London {CROPS }Autumn and winter cauliflower (cut in December onwards)early potatoes (lifted in Spring) sweetcorn _ Spring (cut Autumn) {FERTILISER The soil is good but slightly Chalky and so needs a small amount of{TRIFUROL} which is sprayed on the soil. {WORKERS} There are twelve people on the payroll plus casual workers employed during harvesting only {WORK }This starts at 7.30am and finishes at 4.30pm (1hr lunch).
